member.name: P:Google.Apis.Plus.v1moments.Data.ItemScope.TickerSymbol
member.summary: The exchange traded instrument associated with a Corporation object. The tickerSymbol is expressed as an exchange and an instrument name separated by a space character. For the exchange component of the tickerSymbol attribute, we reccommend using the controlled vocaulary of Market Identifier Codes (MIC) specified in ISO15022.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Plus.v1moments.MomentsResource.Insert(Google.Apis.Plus.v1moments.Data.Moment,System.String,Google.Apis.Plus.v1moments.MomentsResource.Collection)
member.summary: Record a user activity (e.g Bill watched a video on Youtube)
member.param: Required - The ID of the user to record activities for. The only valid values are "me" and the ID of the authenticated user.
Required - Must be one of the following values [vault] - The collection to which to write moments.

member.summary: The collection to which to write moments.
